author: Nectar Gan, Caitlin Hu and Ivan Watson, CNN
title: Beijing tightens grip over coronavirus research, amid US-China row on virus origin
description: China has imposed restrictions on the publication of academic research on the origins of the novel coronavirus, according to a central government directive and online notices published by two Chinese universities, that have since been removed from the web.
